chunk:
Up & Up Acne Spot Treatment (2019 formulation)

Brand: Up & Up

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Active Ingredients: BENZOYL PEROXIDE 2.5%; Inactive Ingredients: WATER, CARBOMER, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, CHLORPHENESIN, DISODIUM EDTA, LAURETH-4, HYDROXYPROPYL METHYLCELLULOSE.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & I
HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
